name: Securitron
description:
Our supply base is under attack by rogue drones. We've evacuated everyone, the only thing remaining is the final cargo platform full of supplies. As our security robot, it is your job to make sure it reaches the extraction point intact!

Collect weapons scattered on the map and use them to destroy enemy drones before they reach the cargo platform. Don't let them touch it - you will lose some of our precious supplies! Escort the platform to the end of the map to win!

The build uploaded post-jam fixes the missing gun model and leftover pickups bug.
